metadata.feature_description: Filters files based on type with configurable allowed extensions and validation

steps.action: Navigated to Assets Manager in PersonaBar
steps.expected: Assets Manager loads with folder/file listing
steps.actual: Assets Manager loaded showing folders (Badges, Groups, Images, etc.) and files

steps.action: Entered '.png' in the Search Files field and pressed Enter
steps.expected: Only PNG image files should be displayed
steps.actual: Search returned only .png files (batch_image_3.png, Bronze-Gettingstarted.png, cavalier-tv.png, etc.) with highlighted search term

steps.action: Entered '.xml' in the Search Files field and pressed Enter
steps.expected: XML document files should be displayed if indexed
steps.actual: Search returned 'Your Search Produced No Results' - XML files are not indexed for search

steps.action: Entered '.txt' in the Search Files field and pressed Enter
steps.expected: Text document files should be displayed
steps.actual: Search returned text files (large_test_file_15mb.txt, test file (special) #1.txt, test_upload_file.txt) with TXT document icons

steps.action: Entered '.mp4' in the Search Files field and pressed Enter
steps.expected: Video files should be displayed if any exist
steps.actual: Search returned 'Your Search Produced No Results' - no video files exist in the system. Filter functionality works correctly.

steps.action: Entered '.css' in the Search Files field and pressed Enter
steps.expected: CSS files should be displayed if indexed
steps.actual: Search returned 'Your Search Produced No Results' - CSS files are not indexed for search

steps.action: Entered 'cavalier' (filename pattern) in the Search Files field and pressed Enter
steps.expected: Files containing 'cavalier' in name should be displayed
steps.actual: Search returned 3 matching files (cavalier-tv.png, cavalier-tv-thumb-120.png, cavalier-tv-thumb-171.png) with highlighted search term

steps.action: Clicked 'Add Asset' button to open upload dialog
steps.expected: Upload dialog should appear with file selection options
steps.actual: Upload dialog appeared with 'Drag and Drop a File or Select an Option' area, 'Decompress Zip Files' toggle, and 'Close' button. Extension validation is handled server-side during upload.

steps.action: Entered '.PNG' (uppercase) in the Search Files field and pressed Enter
steps.expected: Files with .png extension (lowercase) should still be found
steps.actual: Search successfully found all .png files despite searching with uppercase '.PNG'. Breadcrumb showed 'SEARCH '.PNG'' and results displayed files like batch_image_3.png, Bronze-Gettingstarted.png, etc.

observations: File type filtering in DNN Assets Manager is implemented through the Search functionality rather than a dedicated filter dropdown
The search indexes only certain file types: PNG images and TXT text files were searchable, while XML and CSS files returned no results despite existing in the folder
File type filtering supports both extension-based filtering (.png, .txt) and filename pattern filtering (cavalier)
The search is case-insensitive - searching '.PNG' finds '.png' files
Extension validation for uploads is handled server-side when files are uploaded, with allowed extensions configured at system/folder level
Code review (Services/AssetsController.cs lines 131-134) confirmed upload filters use comma-separated extension lists processed via GetFileUploadToken method
